description.value:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

You're used to fighting and hiding in a haze of smoke and flame. You automatically succeed at the Flat Check to target a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} creature if that creature is concealed only by smoke. When you are concealed or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} in smoke, increase the DC of the flat check to target you to 6 if you're concealed or 12 if you're hidden.
